amendment.description: At the end of title V of the bill, add the following: SEC. 5__. COASTAL OVERFLIGHT. The Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration shall ensure that all aircraft transitioning from flight over ocean to flight over land shall fly at a safe altitude. Such altitude shall not be lower than specific flight operations require.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 60 printed in Part A of House Report 115-650 to ensure that aircraft transitioning from flight over ocean to flight over land fly at safe altitude and no lower than specific flight operations require.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rohrabacher amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 37 - 375 (Roll no. 156).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Rohrabacher.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
